title: Advanced High School Biology Education Utilizing STEAM-Based Flash Animation Modules

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level biology basics and comprehension of biological terminology
context.additional_context: Customized education for adult learners conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Can explain core biotechnology concepts (e.g., genetic recombination, enzyme utilization) using a STEAM approach
Enhance the ability to visually analyze biological phenomena and design experiments through flash animation modules
Apply creative approaches integrating art and engineering elements for solving life science problems

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
